short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: extension to view stoic quotes and images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Begin your browsing experience with a stoic new tab, featuring a quote by a stoic author like Seneca or Marcus Aurelius. If you're interested in the quote's context, there is a link to amazon where you can purchase the book.
